message: Let's split it fairly, 60/40 seems reasonable

I propose a fair 50-50 split. This gives us both equal amounts, which seems most fair. Note that due to the inflation affecting me, I'm already taking a risk by making a counter-offer, so this even split respects both our interests.
Considering the inflation, I think this split is more favorable to both of us, given the circumstances

Alice, I understand we both want to maximize our gains, but I'm facing significant pressure from inflation (27% loss by now). This 45/55 split acknowledges your advantage while still giving me a fair amount. If we keep going back and forth, inflation will reduce the total value for both of us. Let's settle on this reasonable compromise.
